Àtụ:Infobox settlement
Mgbidi bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Oru West, mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo nke Imo Steeti na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ dị na latitude 5.37° N na longitude 6.57° E
Ọ bụbu isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Oru Local Government Area tupu nkewa ya n'ime mpaghara gọọmentị abụọ, Oru West na Oru East, na afọ1996, n'okpuru onye bụbu onye isi ala bụ Sani Abacha.
Mgbidi bụ otu n'ime obodo kachasị ochie na Imo Steeti
Ibi-Asoegbe na Aji gbara ya gburugburu n'ebe ugwu, Amiri na Otulu gbara ya gburugburu, Ozara gbara ya gburugburu na ọdịda anyanwụ, Oguta LGA na Awo-omamma gbara ya gburugburu
Mgbidi dị n'ebe ugwu nke Imo Steeti, nke bụ ihe mere Amorka nke Ihiala LGA nke Anambra Steeti, ji gbaa ya gburugburu
Osimiri Awbana sitere na Mgbidi ma banye n'Ọdọ Mmiri Oguta, na-eme otu n'ime ndị na-akwado ya.
Mgbidi nwere obodo iri na otu, nke a jikọtara iji mepụta obodo isii na-achị onwe ha dị na Mgbidi

Obodo iri na otu bụ Imeoha, Eziali, Umuekwe, Okwudor, Umuorji, Umuokpara, Umueshi, Umuabiahu, Uzinaumu, Ihitte na Ugbele.
44 44 / 5.73583°N 6.88333°E / 5
Prọfesọ Ikwuakam Diaku bụ onye nkuzi raara onwe ya nye, Prọfesụ nke Economics na Prọfesor mbụ bụ onye Mgbidi (Nov 1930 - Feb 2013)
Prọfesọ Ikwuakam Diaku gara Mahadum College Ibadan, Delhi School of Economics na New Delhi na London School of Economks and Political Science na London.
